lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Hello, how can I help you?

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: Hello mister I would like to have your attention…I think what I offer will intrigue you

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Oh, and what is that?

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: Information…my business runs on it and I think yours will thrive from it even more

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I don't think I can give you any interesting information. Just a super normal guy working at a very normal kiosk, but if you can tell me what you actually offer, maybe my boss would like to collaborate with whatever you are doing, he was mentioning some stuff recently…

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text:
I am not so sure, unfortunately my boss is not looking for such collaboration. The business works closely with the big companies they have suffered greatly since the 12 NEU regulations on private information.

Even I lost my job after the crash…

So look any customer data you can give me will be very useful. This way everyone wins, what do you say

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Uhh…no….No thanks, I will have to pass. I don't know about my boss, and I am not going to ask him actually, but I don't like to have such dealings with people like you the more I hear the more I get the creeps…

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: Look, I lost my job when NEU regulations hit. Companies only care about data now. You either sell or you starve

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: Who am I? A person doing his best to make a living, nothing more! I can also sell you parts for a discount, I don't make this offer often….

responses.responseText: No need to hear more goodbye Shady

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: No need to hear more goodbye Shady

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: That is not a way to speak to a customer, Cashier. You are proving nothing….just losing a very valuable offer

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: No not interested, please go away or I call the police

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: Piss off…

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
Oh yeah, you are one of those… steals data, then sells it, and acts like they are providing you a service

I think you are wasting your time here and mine

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text:
That is not a way to speak to a customer cashier
You are proving nothing
Just losing a very valuable offer

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: You are not a customer, all of our customers are locals you dont sound local

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text:
You are right, I don't care about the goods you have nor am I from here but how does that even matter?
What if I can offer you valuable information, then my services will be of very good use to your business?
Or vice versa

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I don't care about it. I just work here, and I only work with people who want the goods we sell, and it seems that you are not one of them

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text:
Look, cashier, we are simply providing a service for Brootle…
A service that people don't understand is going to help them

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
Of what service can they really be? And how is that a help when you are going behind their back to learn better how to exploit them
Actually no wait, not a need to hear anything more

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text:
Well, cashier I have been trying to reason with you in a simple human way but you dont listen to reason
How about this then…
My sources….they will take your store data, including yours and then sell it
It is inevitable

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Why don't you do it

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text:
It is easier if you give it now also we cannot access all of it, the encryption is very secure
That is why we offer you a lot of money

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: No, what am I doing, sorry but bye Shady

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text:
Here is my card. I will come back.
You Receive his business card

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: How much money are we talking?

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text:
1000 NEU on the initial data transfer of every full personal information
The less information, the less you have to offer, results less money

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Whoa, that's a lot of money, man

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text:
Yes, there you see it
You can see why I do it, companies are obsessed with data
They give so much money just for a small piece  of information,
If I had a choice, I wouldn't do it, but it is the best a person like me and you can do

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
Yeaa… for companies, they want data that is understandable but still in a legal secure way not through some third party and most importantly without the consent of the user
Talking about that…
Morals man

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text:
The user has never had full consent….
I know it is not the best thing to do, but we just get the data, it is not that accurate
It is still secure, we are not going to use it instead of them, we just give it to giant algorithms that will help companies

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
Don't try to make it light
You are doing something bad

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text:
See, I look at it this way… companies win, I win, you win, and the customer is minimally affected
Best scenario in this age

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
Ok man, you win, fine. I will fold
But I need to see the money first

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text:
Here…
Now transfer me the data quickly…

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
Uff, there you go, shady dude
You happy?

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text:
Of course
We will do more business in the future

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
You know there are cameras everywhere and surveillance 24/7? The NEU is very serious about this stuff. It seems like you don't follow the news, man...
People like you get bad punishment from the government forces

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text:
Well, cashier, without such a risk, there won't be a worthy reward
Besides, do you think I will be this stupid to go to a place where they will catch me
Surveillance is not everywhere; in remote places like these, there is still peace from all the control of the government
It is heaven for what we do

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
Whoa careful it is what you do but not what I do that is for sure
Especially in places like this, new tech is still approaching so you kinda make sense
And still?

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text:
Not a problem for me, I can deal with risk
I can teach you how to do it, but it is up to you

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Well, it should be, for me, it is still a problem, so I will say no, easy as that

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: Is that your final answer?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: What are the prices for information?

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: Since you are my first time customer it will be 500 NEUR but usually it is around 1000 NEUR.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Ah man that is a lot of money, doesnt matter it will help the business maybe this way the boss will increase my salary

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: You see my point now,Cashier? In this economy to be honest means being hungry

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
Yeah dude, besides that I can barely pay my rent let alone the food….It is not easy.
There you go give me what you have

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: Here, check if data is what you need, I am fair in my exchanges…

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Yeah all good now, have more than i needed, thanks dude you saved my skin

lines.speaker: Shady Guy
lines.text: We will do more business in the future, Mr Clerk
